Headline: Temporary Northbound #50 Damen Reroute near Damen/Polk
ShortDescription: Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily near Damen/Polk

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Taylor, Western, Harrison, Damen, and resume normal route due to a street blockage near Damen/Polk.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Southbound #57 Laramie Reroute near Laramie/Madison
ShortDescription: Southbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted near Laramie/Madison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #57 Laramie buses are temporarily rerouted via Laramie, Madison, Cicero, Harrison, Laramie, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Laramie/Madison.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
